message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $1500000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that $1200000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you a discount, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1400000. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1400000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I can offer it to you for $1300000. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're making a final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1100000 and $1300000. I'll offer you $1200000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
